title: Corporate Governance Practices of First Horizon Corp

content.text: The board of directors of First Horizon Corp consists of diverse and experienced individuals with a mix of industry knowledge, business acumen, and expertise in relevant areas. The board is comprised of both independent directors and executive directors. This composition allows for effective decision-making and oversight.

First Horizon Corp demonstrates a commitment to aligning executive compensation with shareholder interests and company performance. The compensation packages of the executives include a mix of base salary, annual cash incentives, and long-term incentives tied to the company's financial and strategic goals. The compensation committee regularly evaluates and determines the appropriate compensation levels.

First Horizon Corp places high importance on transparency and disclosure. They provide comprehensive annual reports, proxy statements, and other governance materials to shareholders and the public. The company also ensures compliance with applicable laws and regulations regarding financial reporting and disclosures.

First Horizon Corp has a well-defined risk management framework that identifies, assesses, and mitigates potential risks. The board actively oversees the risk management process and regularly reviews the company's risk profile and risk appetite. This approach helps protect the interests of shareholders and stakeholders.

First Horizon Corp maintains a strong commitment to ethical conduct and high standards of corporate behavior. They have implemented a code of ethics and conduct that applies to all employees, directors, and officers. The company promotes a culture of integrity, honesty, and responsible business practices.

First Horizon Corp actively engages with shareholders to understand their perspectives, address concerns, and seek feedback. They hold regular shareholder meetings and provide opportunities for shareholders to communicate with the board and management. This approach fosters trust and enhances shareholder value.

First Horizon Corp recognizes the importance of considering the interests of all stakeholders. They engage with employees, customers, communities, and other stakeholders to understand their needs and expectations. This inclusive approach helps the company make informed decisions that benefit all stakeholders.

First Horizon Corp conducts regular evaluations of the board's performance to ensure its effectiveness and identify areas for improvement. The evaluation process includes self-assessment by individual directors, as well as peer evaluations. This practice allows for continuous enhancement of board governance.

news.headline: First Horizon Bank Teaches Financial Literacy Skills to more than 7,000 Students
news.summary: First Horizon Corporation (NYSE: FHN or "First Horizon") is proud to announce its participation in the American Bankers Association (ABA) Foundation's "Teach Children to Save Day," directly providing financial literacy skills to more than 7,000 students. In April, First Horizon associates conducted financial literacy classes for youth across the bank's footprint by imparting essential money management skills and promoting the value of saving from an early age.
